group_1.textRight: The Tokime clan is gradually rebuilding their system@after its collapse,
though right now, I am most worried about@Ms. Shizuka from the head family.
She is in utter shock over the incident@involving the election,
and I believe she is in need of care@by Ms. Sunao and Ms. Chiharu.

group_1.textLeft: The Neo-Magius is still operating behind the scenes,
and it may be nearly time for them@to show their faces to the other groups.
As for Hime, there seems to be some girls@she's interested inâ™ª

group_1.textRight: Promised Blood is struggling,@now that their labyrinth has been removed.
At the moment, they're carefully calculating@what money they have left.
They're on a business trip looking for a hideout.@It's hectic.

group_1.textLeft: ...We'll have to see how it plays out@for Promised Blood.

group_1.textRight: Ah, by the way,@Kagome Satori spoke with me.
She told me something interesting.

group_1.textLeft: What?

group_1.textRight: The Magius combo@of Touka Satomi and Nemu Hiiragi
are at the center of efforts to reveal@the existence of Magical Girls to the world.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:103300:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]!?
I'm glad I was prepared.

group_1.textRight: You mean about Nayuta?

group_1.textLeft: The timing was right,@so I was able to agitate her a little,
and cut off her ties with Touka Satomi.
According to what Urara said,@that was the correct thing to do.

group_1.textRight: But even if they did show the world,@I personally do not think it would spread.

group_1.textLeft: With two geniuses together,@there is no telling what would happen.

group_1.textRight: Well, I suppose there is nothing wrong with@remaining cautious, but...
Also, Rabi,
how long do we have to stay in hiding?

group_1.textLeft: The tides will soon turn,@but I wish to observe a little longer,
since unlike the other groups, we only make four.
By the way,@I did learn of Iroha Tamaki's intentions.

group_1.textRight: Did you talk to her?

group_1.textLeft: No, it was just by chance I overheard her.

group_1.textRight: Is she truly the only one who can bring salvation...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes...
For now, she is the only one who is resisting@the "solution".

group_1.textRight: The Magical Girl conflict rages on, so what would you say is her reason for resisting...?

group_1.textLeft: She is thinking as a Mohist.

group_1.textRight: Mohist?

group_1.textLeft: One of the Hundred Schools of Thought,@philanthropism and pacifism.

group_1.textRight: Hearing that makes me feel like I can find hope.
Were those people able to keep peace?

group_1.textLeft: Legalism won, and they disappeared.

group_1.textRight: Why'd I have to ask...

group_1.textLeft: In the first place, it's not something Iroha Tamaki@can handle alone.
Even if she's "hope", she's too tenuous...

group_1.textRight: She's going to be swallowed up anyway,@by the Awakening...

group_1.textLeft: Yes, the Awakening in which we believe...

group_1.narration: We believe in the "Folklore of Zero":@the Beginning of the End...

group_1.textLeft: What business do you have here...?

group_1.textRight: Merely to check the state of affairs.
